casebody.data:
ADELIA SICKELS et al., Plaintiffs and Respondents, v. WRIGHT GILLIES et al., Defendants and Appellants. Appeal from a judgment in favor of plaintiffs in an action to recover the amount of a promissory note. ■

Before Monell, Freedman, and Curtis, JJ.

Decided April 5, 1873. S. B. Brague, for appellants. Edward T. Bartlett, for respondents. Judgment affirmed.

Opinion by Freedman, J. Monell and Curtis, JJ., concurred.
